00031 NearestNeighborSTANN::NearestNeighborSTANN() {
00032         this->dimension = -1;
00033         this->maxDistance = -1; //default = disable
00034 
00035         nearestPoint3DNeigborHandle = 0;
00036         nearestNeigborHandle = 0;
00037 
00038         points3D = new vector<STANNPoint3D>();
00039         points = new vector<STANNPoint>;
00040         resultIndices = new vector<long unsigned int>();
00041         squaredResultDistances = new vector <double>();
00042 
00043 
00044 }
00045 
00046 NearestNeighborSTANN::~NearestNeighborSTANN() {
00047         if (nearestPoint3DNeigborHandle != 0) {
00048                 delete nearestPoint3DNeigborHandle;
00049         }
00050         if (nearestNeigborHandle != 0) {
00051                 delete nearestNeigborHandle;
00052         }
00053 
00054         points3D->clear();
00055         points->clear();
00056         resultIndices->clear();
00057         squaredResultDistances->clear();
00058 
00059         delete points3D;
00060         delete points;
00061         delete resultIndices;
00062         delete squaredResultDistances;
00063 }

00065 void NearestNeighborSTANN::setData(vector<vector<float> >* data) {
00066         assert(false); //TODO: implement
00067 }
00068 
00069 void NearestNeighborSTANN::setData(vector<vector<double> >* data) {
00070         assert (data != 0);
00071 
00072         if ((*data)[0].size() != STANNDimension) {
00073                 throw runtime_error("Mismatch of data and preconfigured dimension. Please set constant \"STANNDimension\" accordingly. ");
00074         }
00075 
00076         if (nearestNeigborHandle != 0) {
00077                 delete nearestNeigborHandle; // clean up old stuff first
00078         }
00079 
00080         dimension = (*data)[0].size();
00081         points->clear();
00082 
00083         /* fill in the data into the STANN specific representation */
00084         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(data->size()); ++i) {
00085                 STANNPoint tmpPoint;
00086                 for (int j = 0; j < dimension; ++j) {
00087                         tmpPoint[j] = (*data)[i][j];
00088                 }
00089                 points->push_back(tmpPoint);
00090         }
00091 
00092         nearestNeigborHandle = new sfcnn<STANNPoint, STANNDimension, double> (&(*points)[0], static_cast<int>(data->size())); // create morton ordering
00093 }
00094 
00095 void NearestNeighborSTANN::setData(PointCloud3D* data) {
00096         assert (data != 0);
00097         assert(STANNPoint3DDimension == 3);
00098 
00099         this->dimension = 3;
00100 
00101         if (nearestPoint3DNeigborHandle != 0) {
00102                 delete nearestPoint3DNeigborHandle; // clean up old stuff first
00103                 points3D->clear();
00104         }
00105 
00106         double tmpX = 0.0;
00107         double tmpY = 0.0;
00108         double tmpZ = 0.0;
00109 
00110         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(data->getSize()); ++i) {
00111                 tmpX = (*data->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00112                 tmpY = (*data->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00113                 tmpZ = (*data->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00114                 STANNPoint3D tmpPoint(tmpX, tmpY, tmpZ);
00115                 points3D->push_back(tmpPoint);
00116 //              cout << tmpPoint;
00117         }
00118 
00119         nearestPoint3DNeigborHandle = new sfcnn<STANNPoint3D, STANNPoint3DDimension, double> (&(*points3D)[0], static_cast<int>(data->getSize())); // create morton ordering
00120 
00121 }

00123 void NearestNeighborSTANN::findNearestNeighbors(vector<float>* query, std::vector<int>* resultIndices, unsigned int k) {
00124         assert(false); //TODO: implement

00126 
00127 void NearestNeighborSTANN::findNearestNeighbors(vector<double>* query, std::vector<int>* resultIndices, unsigned int k) {
00128         assert (query != 0);
00129         assert (resultIndices != 0);
00130 
00131         if (static_cast<int>(query->size()) != dimension) {
00132                 throw runtime_error("Mismatch of query and data dimension.");
00133         }
00134         if (static_cast<unsigned int>(k) > this->points->size()) {
00135                 throw runtime_error("Number of neighbors k is bigger than the amount of data points.");
00136         }
00137 
00138         STANNPoint queryPoint;
00139         for (int i = 0; i < dimension; ++i) {
00140                 queryPoint[i] = (*query)[i];
00141         }
00142 
00143         squaredResultDistances->clear();
00144         this->resultIndices->clear(); //clear internal vector
00145         resultIndices->clear(); //result vector
00146 
00147         nearestNeigborHandle->ksearch(queryPoint, k, *(this->resultIndices), *squaredResultDistances);
00148         assert( static_cast<unsigned int>(this->resultIndices->size()) == static_cast<unsigned int>(k));
00149         assert( static_cast<unsigned int>(this->resultIndices->size()) > 0);
00150         assert( static_cast<unsigned int>(squaredResultDistances->size()) == static_cast<unsigned int>(k));
00151         assert( static_cast<unsigned int>(squaredResultDistances->size()) > 0);
00152 
00153         brics_3d::Coordinate resultDistance; //distance has same data-type as Coordinate, although the meaning is different
00154         int resultIndex;
00155         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(k); i++) {
00156                 resultDistance = static_cast<brics_3d::Coordinate>(sqrt((*squaredResultDistances)[i])); //seems to return squared distance (although documentation does not suggest)
00157                 resultIndex = static_cast<int>((*(this->resultIndices))[i]);
00158                 if (resultDistance <= maxDistance || maxDistance < 0.0) { //if max distance is < 0 then the distance should have no influence
00159                         resultIndices->push_back(resultIndex);
00160                 }
00161         }
00162 
00163 }
00164 
00165 void NearestNeighborSTANN::findNearestNeighbors(Point3D* query, std::vector<int>* resultIndices, unsigned int k) {
00166         assert (query != 0);
00167         assert (resultIndices != 0);
00168         assert (STANNPoint3DDimension == 3);
00169 
00170         if (static_cast<unsigned int>(k) > this->points3D->size()) {
00171                 throw runtime_error("Number of neighbors k is bigger than the amount of data points.");
00172         }
00173 
00174         resultIndices->clear();
00175         double tmpX = (*query).getX();
00176         double tmpY = (*query).getY();
00177         double tmpZ = (*query).getZ();
00178 
00179 
00180         STANNPoint3D queryPoint(tmpX, tmpY, tmpZ);
00181         this->resultIndices->clear();
00182         squaredResultDistances->clear();
00183         nearestPoint3DNeigborHandle->ksearch(queryPoint, k, *(this->resultIndices), *squaredResultDistances);
00184         assert( static_cast<unsigned int>(this->resultIndices->size()) == static_cast<unsigned int>(k));
00185         assert( static_cast<unsigned int>(this->resultIndices->size()) > 0);
00186         assert( static_cast<unsigned int>(squaredResultDistances->size()) == static_cast<unsigned int>(k));
00187         assert( static_cast<unsigned int>(squaredResultDistances->size()) > 0);
00188 
00189         brics_3d::Coordinate resultDistance; //distance has same data-type as Coordinate, although the meaning is different
00190         int resultIndex;
00191         for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(k); i++) {
00192                 resultDistance = static_cast<brics_3d::Coordinate>(sqrt((*squaredResultDistances)[i])); //seems to return squared distance (although documentation does not suggest)
00193                 resultIndex = static_cast<int>((*(this->resultIndices))[i]);
00194                 if (resultDistance <= maxDistance || maxDistance < 0.0) { //if max distance is < 0 then the distance should have no influence
00195                         resultIndices->push_back(resultIndex);
00196                 }
00197         }
00198 }
